These tasks were designed to reveal the extent to which the interface supported intuitive and efficient content management."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Task Design:"})," Each task reflected an important feature within Creator Studio:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Uploading a Video:"})," Users uploaded a test video, applied metadata, set a publication schedule, and managed settings."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Adding Closed Captions:"})," Users added and synced captions, examining accessibility options."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Reviewing Copyright Claims:"})," Participants reviewed and resolved copyright issues."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Analyzing Performance Using Analytics:"})," Users compared view metrics and engagement data."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Downloading Analytics Reports:"})," Participants exported analytics data as a CSV file."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Pre- and Post-Test Questionnaires:"})," Pre-test surveys assessed users\u2019 familiarity with Creator Studio\u2019s features, while post-test surveys captured feedback on satisfaction, ease of use, and task-specific challenges. This helped identify specific pain points and potential areas for improvement in each feature."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Project 1.2 - Conducting the Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"During the test phase, the team observed participants interacting with Creator Studio, noting user difficulties, points of confusion, and instances where assistance was needed."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Participant Profiles:"})," A mix of experienced YouTubers and casual users provided a balanced perspective on Creator Studio\u2019s functionality."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Test Environment and Conditions:"})," Tests were conducted both in controlled physical settings and virtually through Discord, allowing consistent data collection while capturing authentic user interactions."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Data Collection and Observational Techniques:"})," Data collection combined quantitative and qualitative approaches:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Quantitative Data:"})," Questionnaires captured ratings on ease of use, task completion, and error frequency."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Qualitative Observations:"})," Researchers took detailed notes on user actions, including misclicks and requests for help, which revealed specific usability flaws."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:familiarityUsageChart,alt:"Participant Familiarity and Usage Charts"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Project 1.3 - Reporting the Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This phase analyzed the findings from the usability tests, focusing on quantitative data and user feedback to evaluate ease of use, error frequency, and user preferences between the original and redesigned versions."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Quantitative Analysis and Statistical Testing:"})," Key insights included:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Error Reduction:"})," The prototype (Version B) showed significant improvements in error rates, particularly in advanced tasks."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Ease of Use:"})," The redesigned interface received a higher ease-of-use rating, with the original interface scoring an average of 2.85 compared to 1.54 for the prototype."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:easeOfUseChart,alt:"Ease of Use Rating After Task Completion"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Project 1.4 - Prototyping Solutions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"The prototyping phase focused on developing solutions for the usability issues identified in earlier stages. The team designed enhancements to streamline tasks, particularly in the areas of subtitling and analytics."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Subtitling Task Redesign:"})," The redesigned interface introduced a guided workflow, with clear stages and options for subtitling:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Step-by-Step Workflow:"})," Users were guided through each stage, from language selection to editing, with clear instructions."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Card-Based Subtitle Options:"})," Different captioning methods were presented as card options with icons and descriptions."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:subtitleEditorScreens,alt:"Subtitle Editor Prototype Screens"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Analytics Page Redesign:"})," Key changes included highlighted metrics and terminology tooltips."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Project 3 - Controlled Studies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This phase involved a controlled study comparing the original Subtitle Editor with the redesigned prototype. The aim was to assess whether a step-by-step interface could reduce user errors and improve ease of use."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Results:"})," Key findings included:"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Error Reduction:"})," The redesigned version showed a reduction in error rates, particularly in tasks requiring guidance."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Ease-of-Use Ratings:"})," The prototype received higher ratings, confirming that a structured task flow enhances navigation."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Reduced Confusion:"})," Observations showed fewer instances of confusion with the prototype."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Conclusion and Recommendations:"})," The study validated the benefit of a guided workflow in improving user experience, suggesting implementations such as enhanced tooltips and guided task flows."]})]})]})});};export default YouTubeUsabilityStudy;
